summary: This document appears to be a due diligence report conducted by PWM BIS-RESEARCH regarding The Haze Trust. The report indicates that thorough searches were performed with no significant negative media results found, and it outlines the compliance requirements for further escalation if necessary. The document is marked confidential and includes internal instructions for handling the results.

persons.name: Reena Chandwani
persons.context: Reena Chandwani is the research analyst who prepared the due diligence report on The Haze Trust, indicating that no significant negative media results were found.

keyFacts: The due diligence report found no significant negative media results for The Haze Trust.
The report was prepared by Reena Chandwani on June 15, 2017.
All searches returned no alerts or hits in the required databases.
The document is marked as confidential and includes internal compliance instructions.
There were no court cases or public records found related to The Haze Trust.
